english.segment2: It's been changing me. And now I know You are all I need. You're everything that's right. Here in my life. Chorus
english.segment4: You know my heart feels lighter. No matter what I'm going through. When I say Your name. You know the world gets brighter. That's what Your love can do. With all I have
english.segment5: My heart, my soul, my mind. I'll love You back until the end of time. Now and forevermore
english.segment7: Oh, You opened up my heart
english.segment8: And I walked right in. Yeah. Chorus
